entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nagagami 1:00 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
Temperature: -1.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -3.0°C
Wind: SW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries near noon. Flurries beginning near noon and ending this afternoon. Risk of snow squalls this afternoon. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 early this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 13.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
